name: Golden Soul
description:
Navigate puzzles and defeat enemies with your trusty magic sword to win. Throw your sword and teleport to it! Collect three keys to make it out of the dungeon. But watch out! The game gets harder the more keys you have.

Recommend playing with a controller.

Made for COSC 4358 / 4359 at UH, final build version dated 4/27/2020. View source on GitHub here.
